item.title:
The Sun remix from @jitwam & myself is out today! It’s a sunshine drenched, psych-house freak-out, full of low end & joy.
Jitwam is made of sunshine & this one will keep you moving til sunrise.
Drink in this vitamin D
🌞🌞🌞🌞🌞🌞🌞🌞🌞
https://movementt.ffm.to/sunremix.OYD

item.title:
RT by @ejthackray: I’ve been so blessed to be asked to remix a tune from one of the best doing it rite now, EJT. My remix of ‘SUN’ is out now, link below to hear the full track @ejthackray
→ https://movementt.ffm.to/sunremix

item.title: R to @ejthackray: Special shout out to the lovely lady I met who was at Glasto as a volunteer litter picker. I thought of you all weekend and the good that you do. Volunteers like you keep everything going, so everyone can go again next time. Huge love to everyone working at festivals this summer
item.dc:creator: @ejthackray
item.description: Special shout out to the lovely lady I met who was at Glasto as a volunteer litter picker. I thought of you all weekend and the good that you do. Volunteers like you keep everything going, so everyone can go again next time. Huge love to everyone working at festivals this summer

item.title: R to @ejthackray: Thanks to all the lovely people who came to the signing booth afterwards too. Saying hi to you all is always really special, as I can’t do what I do without you guys.
item.dc:creator: @ejthackray
item.description: Thanks to all the lovely people who came to the signing booth afterwards too. Saying hi to you all is always really special, as I can’t do what I do without you guys.

item.title:
Thank you to my band and team for being maginificent, and thank you to La Magnifique Society and @glastonbury @WestHoltsGlasto for having us.
The @guardian said I was “cosmic and kookie”, and that we looked like “jazz chavs” on stage. All I know is we had a lot of fun.
item.dc:creator: @ejthackray
item.description:
Thank you to my band and team for being maginificent, and thank you to La Magnifique Society and @glastonbury @WestHoltsGlasto for having us.

The @guardian said I was “cosmic and kookie”, and that we looked like “jazz chavs” on stage. All I know is we had a lot of fun.
